body.bibl: Brock, Sebastian P. “The Position of Job in Syriac Biblical Manuscripts: The Survival of an Ancient Tradition.” In Graeco-Latina et Orientalia: Studia in Honorem Angeli Urbani Heptagenarii, edited by Samir Khalil Samir and Juan Pedro Monferrer-Sala, 49–62.
